project.name: semilla
project.title: web presentation engine
project.description: Semilla is a web presentation engine to manage software projects that supports the Common Gateway Interface (CGI). A major feature not found in other related tools is that you can crosslink easily between documents, source code and build results (ex. look comment in include/auth.hh).

pathname.name: semillaConfFile
pathname.description: The configuration file *semillaConfFile* contain paths used by semilla to find the source repositories, templates, etc.

pathname.name: themeDir
pathname.description: themeDir is a directory containing templates and css for the site
